WorkItem.Description:
Despite r36558, I am getting an odd value for my weapon(s), and when the weapon is changed at all, NaN error relating to weapons as both Arms and Fury.  On the dropdown menu, all weapons are wither oddly valued, or not valued at all (depending on if it's mainhand or offhand).  Additionally, the comparisons pane shows odd values for all weapons (not a value, but a straight red bar across the entire width for all weapons).
Â 
Attaching two character files that this happens with.

Comments.Message: I'll try to look at this as soon as I can, but I'm in OK for the week with limited time to check for little stuff and even less points in time where I can actually submit code

Looking just at the XML in the Arms and Fury files
1) Turn off Flooring
2) Remove all the class data for models that aren't for this character

check back with me after doing that
Fixed in checkin.  Didn't have to do with flooring, it was a genuine bug.  You should be able to click on a MH weapon slot and actually see the DPS changes
Could have sworn that I had turned off Flooring.  Regardless, uploading two freshly cleaned-up files for you.  Neither shows any improvement of the issue when fired up.
Or, I should refresh the page before posting.  Will try building the new checkin.
Confirming the issue is resolved.  Thanks!
